memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_write_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_write_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for writes.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_state_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err, int8_t gain, uint8_t mute, uint8_t mode)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_aics *inst, int err, int8_t gain, uint8_t mute, uint8_t mode)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_state_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for the input state.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is read, or if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_gain_setting_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err, uint8_t units, int8_t minimum, int8_t maximum)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_aics *inst, int err, uint8_t units, int8_t minimum, int8_t maximum)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_gain_setting_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for the gain settings.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is read, or if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.
The value that reflect the size of a single increment or decrement of the Gain Setting value in 0.1 decibel units.
The minimum gain allowed for the gain setting.
The maximum gain allowed for the gain setting.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_type_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err, uint8_t type)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_type_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for the input type.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is read, or if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_status_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err, bool active)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_status_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for the input status.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is read, or if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.
Whether the instance is active or inactive.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_description_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err, char *description)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_description_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for the description.

detaileddescription.para: Called when the value is read, or if the value is changed by either the server or client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.
The description as an UTF-8 encoded string (may have been clipped).

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_aics_discover_cb) (struct bt_aics *inst, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_discover_cb

briefdescription.para: Callback function for bt_aics_discover.

detaileddescription.para: This callback will usually be overwritten by the primary service that includes the Audio Input Control Service client.

parameterdescription.para: Error value. 0 on success, GATT error on positive value or errno on negative value. For notifications, this will always be 0.

briefdescription.para: Get a free instance of Audio Input Control Service from the pool.

simplesect.para: Audio Input Control Service instance in case of success or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Get the service declaration attribute.

detaileddescription.para: The first service attribute returned can be included in any other GATT service.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the attributes of the service.

briefdescription.para: Get the connection pointer of a client instance.

detaileddescription.para: Get the Bluetooth connection pointer of a Audio Input Control Service client instance.

parameterdescription.para: Audio Input Control Service client instance pointer.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Audio Input Control Service instance.

parameterdescription.para: Audio Input Control Service register parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_conn *conn, struct bt_aics *inst, const struct bt_aics_discover_param *param)
memberdef.name: bt_aics_discover

briefdescription.para: Discover a Audio Input Control Service.

detaileddescription.para: Attempts to discover a Audio Input Control Service on a server given the param.

parameterdescription.para: Connection to the peer with the Audio Input Control Service.

briefdescription.para: Deactivates a Audio Input Control Service instance.

detaileddescription.para: Audio Input Control Services are activated by default, but this will allow the server to deactivate an Audio Input Control Service.

briefdescription.para: Activates a Audio Input Control Service instance.

detaileddescription.para: Audio Input Control Services are activated by default, but this will allow the server reactivate a Audio Input Control Service instance after it has been deactivated with bt_aics_deactivate.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input state.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service gain settings.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input type.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service input status.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Unmute the Audio Input Control Service input.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Mute the Audio Input Control Service input.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Set input gain to manual.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Set the input gain to automatic.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Set the input gain.

parameterdescription.para: The gain to set (-128 to 127) in gain setting units (see bt_aics_gain_setting_cb).

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Read the Audio Input Control Service description.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Set the Audio Input Control Service description.

parameterdescription.para: The description as an UTF-8 encoded string.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, GATT error value on fail.

briefdescription.para: Get a new Audio Input Control Service client instance.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the instance, or NULL if no free instances are left.

briefdescription.para: Registers the callbacks for the Audio Input Control Service client.

detaileddescription.para: Audio Input Control Service mute states
Audio Input Control Service input modes
Audio Input Control Service input types
Audio Input Control Service Error codes

briefdescription.para: Audio Input Control Service (AICS)

detaileddescription.para: The Audio Input Control Service is a secondary service, and as such should not be used on its own, but rather in the context of another (primary) service.

This API implements both the server and client functionality. Note that the API abstracts away the change counter in the audio input control state and will automatically handle any changes to that. If out of date, the client implementation will autonomously read the change counter value when executing a write request.
[Experimental] Users should note that the APIs can change as a part of ongoing development.
